consent: I declare that I am over 18 years of age. I have received detailed information concerning the conditions of my participation in the study. I agree with these conditions and I am willing to participate.
prereg_experience: Have you ever been involved in a study that was preregistered?
dev_experience: Think of the studies you participated in that were preregistered. Did you deviate from any of the preregistrations?
dev_reputation_1: How much do you agree with the following statement? - I was concerned about my professional reputation for deviating from the preregistration.
report_experience: Do you have experience with reporting discrepancies between a preregistration and the final study?
report_reputation_1: How much do you agree with the following statement? - I would have been concerned about my professional reputation for not reporting discrepancies between my preregistration and the final study.
report_reputation_2: How much do you agree with the following statement? - I was concerned about my professional reputation for not reporting discrepancies between my preregistration and the final study.
prereg_barriers_1: How much do you agree with the following statements? - Preregistration would hold me back from scientific exploration.
prereg_barriers_2: How much do you agree with the following statements? - I would be concerned about my professional reputation if I deviated from my preregistration.
prereg_barriers_3: How much do you agree with the following statements? - I would do preregistration if it increased the chances of my paper being published.
report_consequences_1: Complete the following sentences by choosing one of the options that is closest to your position: - If I reported the deviations between the preregistration and the study, my paper would have [choose option] chance to be published as if I did not report them.
report_consequences_2: Complete the following sentences by choosing one of the options that is closest to your position: - If I reported the deviations between the preregistration and the study, readers would evaluate my work as [choose option] credible as if I did not report them.
report_consequences_3: Complete the following sentences by choosing one of the options that is closest to your position: - If I reported the deviations between the preregistration and the study, readers would evaluate me as [choose option] trustworthy as if I did not report them.
assessed_cr_tr_a_1: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How credible do you consider the study?
assessed_cr_tr_a_2: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How trustworthy do you consider the author?
cr_factors_a: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the credibility of the study? - Selected Choice
tr_factors_a: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the trustworthiness of the author? - Selected Choice
assessed_cr_tr_b_1: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How credible do you consider the study?
assessed_cr_tr_b_2: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How trustworthy do you consider the author?
cr_factors_b: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the credibility of the study? - Selected Choice
tr_factors_b: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the trustworthiness of the author? - Selected Choice
assessed_cr_tr_c_1: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How credible do you consider the study?
assessed_cr_tr_c_2: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How trustworthy do you consider the author?
cr_factors_c: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the credibility of the study? - Selected Choice
tr_factors_c: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the trustworthiness of the author? - Selected Choice
fishy_c: In the summary, you could have read about a deviation from the original study plan. How did you evaluate it?
assessed_cr_tr_d_1: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How credible do you consider the study?
assessed_cr_tr_d_2: Please, evaluate the following. Note that there is no right or wrong answer here: we are interested in your subjective assessments, based on the information at hand. - How trustworthy do you consider the author?
cr_factors_d: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the credibility of the study? - Selected Choice
tr_factors_d: Which of the following factors did you take into account when assessing the trustworthiness of the author? - Selected Choice
fishy_d: In the summary, you could have read about a deviation from the original study plan. How did you evaluate it?
practices_perception_1: Please, answer the following questions. - How common do you think it is for researchers to deviate from their preregistration?
practices_perception_2: Please, answer the following questions. - How common do you think it is for researchers to report discrepancies between their preregistration and the final paper?
practices_perception_3: Please, answer the following questions. - How likely do you think it is that someone (other than the author of an article) would compare a preregistration to the corresponding paper?
requirement: Reporting discrepancies between the preregistration and the final paper is required by… - Selected Choice
guidance: Guidance on the reporting of discrepancies between the preregistration and the final paper is provided by … - Selected Choice
norms: Scientific norms in my institution serve as motivation to report deviations.
training: I have access to training(s) on preregistration.
research_area: What is your primary research area? - Selected Choice
phd_defense: When was your PhD defense? - Selected Choice
phd_defense_2_TEXT: When was your PhD defense? - Year of my PhD defense: - Text
